divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were outside on the balcony talking and we spotted a small group of orange lights in the distance approx 3 miles away. It was not moving and looked like it may have had a spotlight or something. Then it moved higher slowly and shot towards our area. It slowed down abruptly and flew overhead. It made no sound...had 3 orange-ish lights and was silent, it was black in color. It was flying at a wierd angle...like it was turning the whole time and I could see the entire bottom of it the entire time it was overhead, but it was going straight. It flew off to the SW.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Overland Park
There were no other sightings in Overland Park on or around September 8th 2012
Summary: spotted orange lights, not moving, then moved very fast within 2 miles, flew overhead no sound triangle shaped, black.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
